Header: Gnanasara Thera’s rights petition for hearing on 15 Oct.
Content: The fundamental rights petition filed by the Ven. Galagoda Atthe Gnanasara Thera was taken up in the Supreme Court today. The Supreme Court scheduled the hearing of the petition for the 15th of October. The Ven. Gnanasara Thera in his petition is seeking to issue an order saying that the verdict given by the Homagama Magistrate’s Court to remand him over a complaint made in January 2016 by the wife of Prageeth Ekneligoda, is illegal. The petitioner is calling on the Supreme Court to issue a statement saying that as a result his fundamental rights had been violated. Gnanasara Thera who was convicted in this incident is now enlarged on bail following the filing of an appeals petition.
